name: volatile-cedar

procedures: T1105::[Volatile Cedar] can deploy additional tools.
T1190::[Volatile Cedar] has targeted publicly facing web servers, with both automatic and manual vulnerability discovery.
T1505.003::[Volatile Cedar] can inject web shell code into a server.
T1595.002::[Volatile Cedar] has performed vulnerability scans of the target server.
T1595.003::[Volatile Cedar] has used DirBuster and GoBuster to brute force web directories and DNS subdomains.

description: [Volatile Cedar](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0123) is a Lebanese threat group that has targeted individuals, companies, and institutions worldwide. [Volatile Cedar](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0123) has been operating since 2012 and is motivated by political and ideological interests.(Citation: CheckPoint Volatile Cedar March 2015)(Citation: ClearSky Lebanese Cedar Jan 2021)
